Package org.springframework.statemachine.transition

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Transition<S,E>
    Transition is something what a state machine associates with a state changes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractExternalTransition<S,E>  
    AbstractInternalTransition<S,E>  
    AbstractLocalTransition<S,E>  
    AbstractTransition<S,E>
    Base implementation of a Transition.
    DefaultExternalTransition<S,E>  
    DefaultInternalTransition<S,E>  
    DefaultLocalTransition<S,E>  
    InitialTransition<S,E>
    Transition used during a state machine start.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TransitionConflictPolicy
    Enumerations for possible transition conflict policies.
    TransitionKind
    Defines enumeration of a Transition kind.
